SYSTEM: 03_RDF%28S%29_APIS_and_SPARQL_%28complete%29.pdf: Página 33
© O. Corcho, R.García-Castro, O. Muñoz-García
36
RDF and RDF Schema
Graph patterns
• Basic Graph Patterns, where a set of triple patterns must 
match
• Group Graph Pattern, where a set of graph patterns must 
all match
• Optional Graph patterns, where additional patterns may 
extend the solution
• Alternative Graph Pattern, where two or more possible 
patterns are tried
• Patterns on Named Graphs, where patterns are matched 
against named graphs
speaker: SYSTEM
